Camoflage::

She emerges from the CR chamber and walks around the base. She sniffs 
the air and finds a faint scent. It intriques her, so she follows it. 
She walks around to the private quarters and back around to the main 
entrance. She keeps her little fox nose to the ground as she follows 
the scent out the entrance and outside. (It's Nightlight's scent)




--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, Richard Allen <roborick007@y...> wrote:
> 
> : : Kup : :
> Kup(via commlink): Rodimus is out meeting with Hydras and Optimus 
Pri... Wait, Nightlight was looking for him? She was here when he 
left so she would have known he wasn't at the base. And she is with 
Flicker? Flicker was being investigated by Condor... Aerotaur, 
something is wrong. Follow them!
> Kup turns to Yggdrasil.
> Kup: Keep the shields up and the base locked off.
> Kup heads out of the office to find Flicker and Nightlight. He 
draws his plasma rifle, holding it to his side. He then opens a comm 
channel.
> Kup: Kup to Condor, do you read?
>  Rudra656@a... wrote:::Aerotaur:: 
>       "I'd be happy to Nightlight, it would be my pleasure."  He 
bows his head slightly and walks off past Nightlight and Flicker 
holding Elita close to his body.  He coos softly in her ear and walks 
to Rodimus's chambers to put Elita down for a nap and look for 
Rodimus.  With her safely in her crib he opens a com link to 
Kup.  "Sir, I was wondering if you could tell me where Rodimus is.  I 
checked his chambers but he's not here.  Nightlight asked me to tell 
him that she's waiting for him.  She was leaving on a mission with 
Flicker I believe."
